item.title: I think I wanna marry you! (It’s not what you think…)
item.description: Burning Man Wedding At Church Trap Burning Man 2013 by Duncan Rawlinson Weddings – they’re definitely not like they used to be! In some ways, that’s good. In others, maybe not so much. When it comes to spending a chunk of cash that could be better spent on a house or a car or a really expensive couch, I think things are maybe a little more frenzied than they used to be.
